net.tridentsdk.meta.block

Interface ColorMeta

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BlockMeta<Block>, Meta<Block>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorMetaImpl

    @ThreadSafe
public interface ColorMeta
extends BlockMeta<Block>
    Represents metadata belonging to blocks of wool
    Since:
    0.4-alpha
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team
